post.author: BNA!
post.body:
Please do NOT reply to spam topics - if you think it's a too clever concealed spam, then send me a pm WITH the DIRECT link to the topic.

Just to repeat: Please do NOT reply to spam topics!

PM's I frequently get saying "There's spam in forum x" are not helpful even if the good intention is taken by heart.
